alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 9:23PM CDT until May 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Stone County in north central Arkansas... Southwestern Izard County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 923 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchard Springs Campground, or 11 miles northwest of Mountain View, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Herpel... Brandenberg... Lone Star... Gorby... Blanchard Springs Campground... Allison... Mt Olive in Izard County... Fifty-Six... Boswell... Optimus... Onia... Twin Creek... Sylamore Bike Trail... Gunner Pool Campground... Sylamore... Barkshed Campground... Sylamore Shooting Range... Newnata... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
